'''"Maison Cardinalice's Stores"''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for "Maison Cardinalice's Stores" is obtainable from a [[Remarkable Chest]] in [[Fontaine]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a Remarkable Chest in [[Lutz]]'s office in the Dormitory Block level of the [[Fortress of Meropide]].
<gallery>
Item Maison Cardinalice's Stores Location.png|Map location
Item Maison Cardinalice's Stores Context.png|Additional context
</gallery>

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=60}}.

}}
